title: Sandra_hakeem
author: Sandra_hakeem
content: Hey y'all, I have been looking up to this and I got it finally.Three things happened at the same pace; * I got ranked as a full member(with a good merit to activity ratio according to MALEK et JAY)* My country celebrated its independence* I got accepted by Hhampuz ...... Could all these be like, a coincidence? Yeah?ðŸ˜„Note: This is not made to BEG-for-MERIT; that was why I refuse to celebrate myself when I became a member cus I wouldn't want anyone to feel I'm begging for merit and that's the LAST THING I'D DO.I didn't wanna call out names in appreciation but, that'll look really 'mean' to them. For that reason,I won't forget to thank THE CHYMIST, NotATheter, JAY JUAN GEE, EXEMPLENS, LoGitech MOUSE, BRAINBOSS, PHilipMa, PMaLEK and the rest that I'd love to mention if I had a longer script. I'm making this in form of a rhyme at EVERY SENTENCE END.  something I wrote down ever since I was a jrn memberÂ  here is it* some hours in the late 21, I got an  account* was sick all day so I left it some days to  count*  finally I'm back, I've got a price to pay, what's the  amountðŸ¤·* it ain't fungible, just sacrificing some time to  mount* took up forums rules , well yeah, I was probably late*  plagiarism and spamming became, but to newbies as a  bait ðŸŽ£*  though these rules and getting perma-ban from the forum had something to  relate*  yeah? Each time anyone from any rank got perm-banned, the rest were left to their fateâ˜¹ï¸* DT members, driven with static potentials are hunting phishers et spammers, I'd say they deserve kudos and even some more  accolades  ðŸ‘*  Theymos, the undisputable has overworked himself, day and night, swaying these assholes in a dungeon, sip some  chocolatesâ˜•* maybe you'll think I copied this from somewhere? Make your research and you'll realize, she  formulates*  I've done what I know how to do best so if you think I'm merit-begging, check my history or consider it some fucking postulates*  finally, I ranked up, been dreaming of these all day and it means alot to me ðŸ¥º*  feel sorry for those that left, the likes of vod, lauda, SATOSHI himself and also my mon-amiðŸ˜£*  even more sorry for the ones who were lowered six-feet dip, BECKY,HAL, I'm sorry mate,life got two columns,after A you've got a column BðŸ˜“*  I'm sad and happy at the same time. Haven't really seen femmes ranking lately,so I wanna become a legendary- shE .Sandra ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ¦±

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PMHey y'all, I have been looking up to this and I got it finally.Three things happened at the same pace; * I got ranked as a full member(with a good merit to activity ratio according to MALEK et JAY)* My country celebrated its independence* I got accepted by Hhampuz ...... Could all these be like, a coincidence? Yeah?ðŸ˜„Three things sayeth thou, congratulations! However, you left out health and life. Without those two, nothing can be achieved.On your rank up, there's no need to panic that anyone would think you want to beg for merit. Feel free doing that at Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!. Even if anyone thinks so, you deserve the merit. Don't allow anyone kill your joy.Truly, Nigeria had her independence yesterday. It was a 62nd anniversary that was marked in a low-key. I didn't even feel any impact of it. Did you see that disgraceful parachute landing by our military to mark the event? They couldn't control where they were landing and it was laughable.On your selection into a signature campaign: I hope you know that campaigns come and go. You could be in one today and out of it by next week.By the way, I don't think this post should be in Meta. You can ask the mods to move it to the right section.

comments.author: NYMIE
comments.created_time: October 02, 2022, 03:57:15 PMLast edit: October 02, 2022, 04:13:17 PM by NYMIE
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PMHey y'all, I have been looking up to this and I got it finally.Three things happened at the same pace; * I got ranked as a full member(with a good merit to activity ratio according to MALEK et JAY)* My country celebrated its independence* I got accepted by Hhampuz ...... Could all these be like, a coincidence? Yeah?ðŸ˜„You have very good luck. What's your zodiac mate?Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PM*  I'm sad and happy at the same time. Haven't really seen femmes ranking lately,so I wanna become a legendary- shE .Sandra, you are not alone, I am also a woman and it is not only you who dream of becoming a Legendary ranked woman in this forum. I also have a desire even though it's not something easy because being the highest ranking member has a big responsibility and I haven't been able to get to that level.Sandra. What Mpamaegbu said seems true that this post is more suitable in the Reputation thread

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I can't wrap my head around you and the way you structure your sentences. It's peculiar, uncommon, and unique in its own way. I don't think it's Nigerian thing because I don't see the same form with other members of the Nigerian community. I am not talking about that poetry in the OP, but your posts in general. It's certainly different from what I usually see. Not in a bad way, just different...Congratulations on your most recent achievements and keep them coming.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: Congratulations on your new rank, youâ€™re now a full fledged member of bitcointalk, full member rank feels great cause itâ€™s really your first big rank. I like your poem, especially this part â€œmaybe you'll think I copied this from somewhere? Make your research and you'll realize, she formulatesâ€ really niceâ€¦made me think back to high school when I used to put words together trying to make a rhyme out of them. Your style is quite unique, itâ€™s rare to see a member write a poem to celebrate their new rank. Oh I did thatÂ   I hope you reach your legendary goal

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PMFor that reason,I won't forget to thank THE CHYMISTThank you for using my preferred moniker; I see it as a sign of respect--and also that you pay attention to things, unlike so many members who just drop post after post without ever reading.Â  Good on you, sister.Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PM*  Theymos, the undisputable has overworked himself, day and night, swaying these assholes in a dungeon, sip some  chocolatesBig daddy T can smoke the chocolate for all I care, but it'd be so nice if he did me the smallest of favors (you could even consider it my reward for being a merit source) and changed my username.Â  Or, failing that, at least increase my sMerit allocation.Â  I've got a waiting list for post history reviews that stretches around the block and no merits to give.Â  Hope you're reading this, my man.And congrats to you on reaching Full Member, Sandra!Â  It's obvious you put a lot of effort into your posts, strange and amusing as they often are.Â  Your personality is distinct and comes across in your writing, and with the vast majority of members here that's not the case.Â  Pick any thread in the gambling section, or even Bitcoin Discussion and you'll see so many posts that indicate nothing about the person writing them.Â  They're all so bland and cookie-cutter, so it's refreshing when a character like you shows up.Â  Keep up the good work.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on October 02, 2022, 04:57:36 PMI can't wrap my head around you and the way you structure your sentences. It's peculiar, uncommon, and unique in its own way. I don't think it's Nigerian thing because I don't see the same form with other members of the Nigerian community. I am not talking about that poetry in the OP, but your posts in general. It's certainly different from what I usually see. Not in a bad way, just different...Even I can confidently say he is not a newbie since his first post. I saw an experienced member behind the way he laughed. LOLQuote from: Sandra_hakeem on November 11, 2021, 12:28:12 AM-snip->> Â  <<Sandra_hakeem, congratulations on everything you did and got it. I know where your forum is going even when you don't want to celebrate every phase of improvement at all. Do what you want to do, as long as it does not violate the rules then I believe you deserve the freedom to express knowledge in a way that is unique and different from others. I don't find much of a problem with how you improve, but you are a unique user. Uhhmm

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PM*  I'm sad and happy at the same time. Haven't really seen femmes ranking lately,so I wanna become a legendary- shE .Congratulations on your Full Member rank Sandra_hakeem. Enjoy your celebrations, it may not be long before your rank will quickly rise to Senior Member without you even knowing it. you have a good goal. I hope you stay consistent to get it.I'm sure soon you will also update your rating here again. surely it will need more effort. but I'm sure you can.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PMI didn't wanna call out names in appreciation but, that'll look really 'mean' to them. For that reason,I won't forget to thank THE CHYMIST, NotATheter, JAY JUAN GEE, EXEMPLENS, LoGitech MOUSE, BRAINBOSS, PHilipMa, PMaLEK and the rest that I'd love to mention if I had a longer script. I'm making this in form of a rhyme at EVERY SENTENCE END.  something I wrote down ever since I was a jrn memberMy name being included beside some of the notable users here is kind of flattering but... I just don't know what to say but congratulations to your new rank. With how you are posting and how uncommon you are compared other average users like us, I'm pretty sure that you will reach the Legendary Rank in no time. I'm predicting that in less than a year, you will be a Legendary-She that you wanted to be . There are many threads here already who are giving merits to those users who are contributing to the community.those rhymes are very lovely.you getting accepted in a campaign isn't called "being lucky".try to help for the communityand one day, you will reach Legendary-SheJust tried what you did out of nowhere (impromptu) but congratulations on your new rank .

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PM*  I'm sad and happy at the same time. Haven't really seen femmes ranking lately,so I wanna become a legendary- shE .Sandra ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ¦±Is there gender on the Internet? Here on the forum, we can be anyone. Now in the world, there is not only a man and a woman but something in between . So I don't think it matters. Even if you claim to be female, there will be those who won't believe you, so don't bother. I also want to congratulate you. You really have a bright personality with this nickname and a peculiar speech. The fact that you are not a beginner, I think many people understand, but life is a theater, and we are actors. You are doing great. Keep going. Best wishes to you.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: Oluwa-btc on October 03, 2022, 05:15:32 AMMan! I can also say that one can be guided by a well known member ( In the forum ) What I'm tryna say is that, Sandra don't seem like what you've got innit your head, I think she got properly oriented by whoever Introduced her innit. ( The person must be so proud of her )LOL, not what I thought? I don't suspect the OP is alt account by experienced user on the forum [although it's possible to have alt], but he's not a newbie to bitcoin and cryptocurrencies by his admit. But why argue about it, I guess this really doesn't need to be done. It's up to you how to read my mind through writing, you may fail to catch what I want to say.But you'll probably understand when you read this one.Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on November 11, 2021, 12:28:12 AM Hi everyone, i have a trusted business partner that introduced me to bitcoin few years ago,since i was so keen about these digital currency, he had to introduce me to these great forum.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on October 03, 2022, 05:31:46 AMIs there gender on the Internet? Here on the forum, we can be anyone.I just realized that Sandra doesn't want to hide her gender.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 02, 2022, 12:43:15 PM*  I'm sad and happy at the same time. Haven't really seen femmes ranking lately,so I wanna become a legendary- shE .Sandra@Sandra, Nigeria has some top legendary members here, they are growing fast in the forums, their knowledge of Bitcoin/crypto is top too, I know some Nigerian members here, venerable forum rules for them, I can't imagine them growing so fast, it's unexpected, I hope you do too, following in their footsteps of success here.Continue to develop your talents here to pursue your dream of becoming a legendary member, I wish you good luck to achieve what you want, I pray that you can achieve what you want, even though I don't know you for real, but you are already here, so you are also part of the others.

Apart from that, they also have a good knowledge of Bitcoin and other cryptos.I'm sure if you continue to be active on this amazing forum, then you'll catch up with them soon too.With what you have achieved so far, it further proves that the merit system works well for the advancement of the forum.In addition to the names you mentioned, there are other names who are ready to help the development of every account that has an active role in this forum.Keep your good reputation @Sandra.

comments.body: Hey y'all, no one said anything about eatin' cakes & pizza and Poppin up the whole winery in Boston?? Or maybe newyork? ðŸ˜†ðŸ˜†ðŸ˜‚Jay, commonnn dude!! You're late for the party....lolWell, I'm happy cus uh..h... Â ...I don't even know what to say anymore guys but believe me, this whole congrats are mind-blowing.*Mpamaegbu, I'm happy cus you've created a whole arena of Providence to my dreams and that makes me more -- kinda -- intrepid. I guess I'd have to get up, on my feet and grasp, like a wounded tigress, shaking off the shackles and moving to where I'm meant to be.Â Thanks alot.* NYMIE ,Thanks alot too. I'm seeing you around for the first time but that's awesome as it has some magnanimity, tailored on yesterday's celebration and... and you're a genius! Okay?You're gonna be like me soon then you're gonna step-up like I just did, for sure. See ya out there!Well , well , what have we got here?* THE SCEPTICAL CHYMIST !!! Â A good dude that makes several reviews on innovative threads in its accurate proportion. I'd compare him to @chart buddy,just that they're doing different jobs. So I'm supposed to address him as MERIT-BUDDY right? Lol Thanks great-one for everything. I owe you alot -i mean, alot of respect man,ain't cut up - alot cus you've realized the potentials in me, and you've given your time, resources and have neglected any form of arrogance -- something anyone else would wear as a golden garment -- you've broken the indulgence that alot of peeps merit post for 'who they know' not 'what they know'. I can and would say out, if in future, there's a golden feather to remarkably attest to some OP's magnificence,YOU SHOULD BE AMONGST THE FIRST THREE. I'm not bluffingHey there THEYMOS, I appreciate your whole efforts in holding-up these great forum,with your brain-strenght and we all ain't paranoid, YES,you deserve to be THEYMOS and no one else, Yeah. This man made an appeal and I guess he's left in a DILEMMA. You wouldn't wanna leave him crying for too long, Â would you? No! You won't, Cus you're Theymos and AFAIK, you can restructure things in his favour, A bit. I know you're reading these, I believe that you see everything. Help out!! Lemme share his plight man. He just wants to help! Let's be hopeful CHYMIST, things will be kept properly but, thanks onceagain and don't be late to the party - Boston- lol.*MALEK, Without a doubt, you're of good espionage. Your words ain't turgid and has one meaning to a light-headed fellow but to the gurus, myself, it ambiguity was fancied, to a point I that I read it 4 good times. You're incurruptible, Yeah, and I respect the fact that you're PMaLEK and that makes you irreplaceable. Thanks alot of getting me grounded.*Black_star,Ahaa!! You're cool buddy. So you like to address me as a 'he'?? I'm not even stressed as far as that doesn't bother you?!I'm happy for you too and I'm grateful at the same time. You see e.....ehhhh, a goat can't be called an IBEX,. No matter how they look alike. That's the case here and my posting style stays as my integrity. Thanks that the forum allows freedom of speech and it's not built under some bossy- bereaucrats. So anyone who is highly intellectual in real life, will be known from the way he/she talks here.Thanks Buddy.Lovesmay, Yoshie, Ayla,Oluwa, poka, Logitech, pandu ...you guys are awesome. I value everyone's comment in here', y'all made my day "Pink" for me. You should see how pinkish my cheeks are looking right now..lol Look, I dunno you guys personally but, I know - from my personal scrutiny - y'all good people. Thanks once again to entirely, everyone.Cheers ,sandra ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ¦±

I'm seeing you around for the first time but that's awesome as it has some magnanimity, tailored on yesterday's celebration and... and you're a genius! Okay?You're gonna be like me soon then you're gonna step-up like I just did, for sure. See ya out there!I'm just a woman who spends her day doing housework as a maid. I am obsessed with my employer who has the generosity in helping the underprivileged. Once on one occasion, my employer told me while I was cleaning the garden of his house, "Your job may be as a maid, but you must be a hero to your sister. The world is sophisticated, you must be able to read future opportunities."

You are doing great. Keep going. Best wishes to you.That is a nice speech from...LMF. In the internet everybody can be any person, and social media is worst of them all. The distinction can only be seen in physical world but for digital it is impossible unless there is voice communication. Even the voice communication can not be used to detect a feminine or a masculine voice. Cell phone can be tune to any of the voices and communication can go smoothly without interruption. Females are precious in my world, they are EggÂ  and Roses in my House.Â  A special Bogus African Black Beauty Poem will drop to LMF. By the way, I was told that any achievement be a ranks etc should be dropped in this thread by BitcoinGirl.Club, but seen that the instruction is not working again. Congratulations Sandra_hakeem. keep up burning the fire. I wish you all the best.
